mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author, regdate, recnt FROM ( SELECT id, title, content, author, regdate, recnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY id DESC) AS RNUM FROM board) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM board where id > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE board set recnt = recnt + 1 where id=#{id}
